title: Welcome ðŸ‘‹
description: GOAT is a WebGIS platform with planning intelligence for urban and transport planning. Equipped with rich data and functionalities, it provides planners and GIS analysts with fact-based analysis. Along with computing benchmarks and analyzing existing situations, potential scenarios can be created and assessed. The platform offers a modern user interface and an intuitive user flow to simplify the planning process. GOAT's main goal is to enable smarter, more collaborative, and efficient planning through its innovative features and design.
